item.title: Permit holders only parking sign missing, 15th October
item.description:
A pole was installed outside 37 St Pauls Street North but the required signplate has never been fitted.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Saint Pauls Street North, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is missing (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: The end of whitelands lane floods whenever it rains heavily. The water rises on the end of Whitelands Lane by a blockage in the pipe running to the ditch further along the Shurdington Rd by the bus stop., 15th October
item.description:
Whitelands lane (at the end of) outside the Dawn Nurseries which causes considerable flooding which reaches across the Main A46.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
